title: En Toute Innocence = No Harm Intended
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Andre Lay.
description: Paul Duchene runs an architecture practice with his son Thomas and Thomas' wife, Catherine. One day, Paul finds Catherine in the arms of one of his assistants. Seething with rage, he drives off in his car and has an accident that leaves him crippled and mute. Failing a reconciliation, his daughter-in-law plans his murder.  Credits: Producer, Louis Duchesne ; director, Alain Jessua ; writers, Luc Beraud, Alain Jessua, Dominique Roulet ; photography, Jean Rabier ; music, Michel Portal. Cast: Michel Serrault, Nathalie Baye, Francois Dunoyer, Suzanne Flon, Philippe Caroit.
